channel.title: lard on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in lard on Recipes

item.title: breaded meat medallions
item.description: 2 pounds of ground beef 1 grated onion 1/2 tablespoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper powder 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg 4 eggs 1 1/2 cup cookie powder frying fat 8 toasted bread medallions mustard sauce Place the meat in a bowl and add the onion, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Integrate well add 2 eggs, integrating each one ligating well. Add cracker meal to give consistency to the dough, but it should still be soft.

item.title: corncakes
item.description: 2 cups corn flour 4 cups of water 1 teaspoon salt 1 pound of pork 1 onion 2 ounces of ham 3 tablespoons lard 1 pepper 1 tomato 1 teaspoon salt lard Prepare a hard funche using flour, water and salt. Grind the other ingredients into the machine and add the salt. Simmer. Season at ease. On a greased banana leaf, pour two tablespoons of funche and spread it in a circle.

item.title: roast chicken
item.description: 1 3 lbs. chicken cut into pieces wheat flour, salt and pepper frying fat 1-1-2 cups sifted flour 1 1-2 teaspoon powder baking 1 teaspoon salt 4 eggs 1 1-2 cup milk 3 tablespoons butter or fortified margarine, melt gives black pepper Put the chicken pieces in a cartridge, with flour, salt and pepper, and shake the cartridge so that the pieces are well covered with flour. In a large skillet, endow the chicken on both sides, in hot fat.
